attributes.action: raise his salary threefold, disolve parliament and declare himself Queen of May
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
He's already living in fairyland, about to be given the boot and unlikely to have bought himself a place in the House of Lords.

Out in the real world he may just have to come to terms with the nightmare he helped create, so lets give him the opportunity to continue in his make-believe fairy-tale land...

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
